hotels.title: Art Deco Spanish Luxury in the Heart of Granada with Rooftop Cocktail Bar
hotels.description: Located in the heart of Granada - a dreamy Spanish haven, showcasing the epitome of Mediterranean wonder - you will discover the Seda Club Hotel, designed for the lover of Art Deco splendour and modern luxuries. This retreat boasts pure style with a rooftop cocktail bar overlooking the cathedral. Spend hours wandering the cobblestoned streets, stopping only to indulge in some authentic tapas and to admire the culture, before returning to treat yourself to an afternoon in the spa.
